review_text:
It was well worth the money. The place and grounds were better than I expected with the dock to sit at and reflect watch the sunset. The house was spacious beautiful the added amenities that they had if anyone forgot something they had it there for you. I would rent this place again when I'm in town. I would give this a 5 star.
Roy

Our time at Traci's home was strictly for relaxation and it was perfect. No noisy neighbors. The dock and boat house were perfect for morning coffee, afternoon naps, evening cocktails and overall enjoyment of being on water. Traci has two very nice kayaks which we used each day. We brought our bikes because there is a large park nearby with a nice bike path.
We aren't much for nightlife or going out to eat so can't comment on that.
Traci's home was probably one of the cleanest Airbnb's I have ever stayed in. Comfortable furniture and great mattress. Everything you could want in the kitchen. We were about 2 hours early for check-in and it was not a problem. We brought our own chairs (the antigravity kind) for the dock. Traci has furniture on the dock but it is wrought iron furniture which makes perfect sense because it stays outside.
I really have nothing negative to say at all.
Thank you Traci
Great place. Very near the golf course we were playing . The Florida Elks Club annual tournament. Reasonably priced. Would definitely stay there again.
This was our second stay at Traci's place in Sebring. It's super clean space with room for the whole family. We'll be back again next year.

Stayed for a couple of days before a cruise. Loved the house. Loaded with anything that we needed. Very clean and spacious. Check in was extremely easy. Loved the lake and lake house. We were wishing that we had come earlier than we did. We will stay again. Thank you for sharing Traci!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The home was immaculate and gorgeous. We loved the luxury linens and towels, and all of the extras Traci had. A fully stocked coffee bar was perfect! We highly recommend this beautiful home. The house, screened porch, and dock are all you need to relax and enjoy sunny Florida!

We’ve been coming to Florida for about 5 years now via AirBnB and Traci’s place was one of the best. It exceeded all our expectations. It was very clean, all the amenities were in place, it felt like home. Traci went above and beyond to take care of all our needs. We had a main city water line break on the block about 8 o’clock at night. I called Traci and she took action to make sure it was resolved. Water was back on in less than an hour. She even gave me a refund for the trouble. The house is lovely, and the view of the lake spectacular.
Very clean! There were plenty of towels and eBay thing you would need. They thought of everything. We only stayed 3 nights but loved the lake and dock.

The lakefront view is really gorgeous. Even on a cloudy day, the misty lake was great to look at. When the sun came out, it was stunning. The place is close to the city center, yet peaceful. Way better than any of the hotels I have stayed at for visiting Sebring. A 5 star place!
Everything was super organized and comfortable. Amazing location and hospitality from the hosts. We felt like we were home!
Very nice place

This is our 3rd year staying at Manatee Manor! As always, our stay was great! The house is always clean and has everything you could possibly need! New addition this year was the easy entry using the lock code. Great stay and great place!
Loved our stay! The house was fully stocked and felt like home. Beautiful sunrises! Loved hanging out on the dock. Would absolutely stay here again!
Pretty location. Extremely clean home. We would definitely stay there again if visiting Sebring.
Traci has a great place, set up well for everything you need. Very beautiful space with great indoor/outdoor setting.

what a wonderful stay on the lake. It was the perfect place for a lovely visit with my parents. The kitchen was the best equipped of any kitchen we have ever rented. And the views from every room to the blue blue lake was amazing.
Great host

My family is extremely pleased with our stay at Manatee Manor. My grandkids loved fishing off the dock. They caught bass. The kitchen has everything to prepare meals. Traci was fast to respond to a minor issue and accommodated me for the minor inconvenience. We recommend this home for your stay.

Absolutely comfortable, peaceful and beautiful place to stay when visiting the Sebring area! The screened patio facing the lake provides a perfect place to begin and end each day, regardless of the weather.

The house sits in a quiet area with an amazing lake view that you can also walk out to , the home is beautiful and spacious We enjoyed staying at this home very much very organized and clean pace is great also everything you need in a kitchen We definitely recommend this home

Manatee Manor was exactly what we were looking for! There was lots of room for our family vacation. The house had everything that we needed which helped immensely since we drove from WI. The only downside was that we wish we could have spent more time at the house but the main purpose of the trip was to spend time at SIR. So easy to drop off people in the morning and go back with the kids in the afternoon. Would recommend and return in a heartbeat!
Our second stay here. It won’t be our last. Exactly as described and very comfortable. Thank you. We hope to be back in the fall.
Wonderful house. Very clean and comfortable. Traci is a friendly and responsive host. Will definitely stay at this house again:)

Traci's home is lovely. We spend a lot of time fishing off the dock. Traci left a lot of information on near by places to visit. It was a pleasure to return after a day out, to relax and enjoy this very nice, comfortable home. Hope to visit again.

This was our first time staying in Sebring Fl
The house was great very clean and host was available when we had questions.
We fished from the dock and caught bass,catfish & gar!!!
We had so much planned during our stay but honestly the next stay we are planning more time at the house just relaxing on the screen porch!!

What a wonderful home! Beautiful location, everything you could need already there, super cute house, convenient to everything! Our host was exceptional with any questions. I can't recommend staying here enough.
Fantastic place and very clean. Very enjoyable to sit in the back patio for morning coffee or on the dock. Very convenient to where we needed to be. Hope to be back again.

This was our 2nd time staying at Manatee Manor and we had another great stay. Traci has given a lot of thought to the comfort of her guests - the kitchen has everything you need to cook, the towels are thick and fluffy, you can grill, do your laundry, play board games, watch tv, get online... The check-in and check out are quick and easy. I highly recommend staying at Manatee Manor!
Fantastic time staying on the lake!

Manatee Manor is a lovely vacation home. I had three criteria in my search for a rental for the long Thanksgiving weekend: on the water or a water view; a screened lanai or patio for reading and quiet time; and plenty of video entertainment for my husband. This house has them all with unexpected bonuses - a very well-equipped kitchen, and super-comfortable couch and chairs for reading with plenty of lighting. At this time of year both the sunrise and sunset over the water are visible from the lanai. The house feels very private and quiet but is only a short drive to Sebring’s downtown and Route 27 with its shopping, restaurants, and entertainment. A five-star stay!
Amazing house, so peaceful, so many personal touches. My family loved it here and we will return. Truly amazing.

The stay was really nice. The view on the lake is very peaceful. Having the kayaks to go one the lake is a lot of fun.
The dock is really nice to stay on.
The house is fully equipped with a nice kitchen and bbq.
The sofa are soft and they have small blankets just in case …
I really loved the thick and soft towels
Do not hesitate to book

Traci’s place was absolutely perfect! Everything was immaculate and thought through. We had enough plates and serving dishes to make and have meals at home - and the cooking spices and oils, too! The bathrooms were super clean and I loved my hot showers with strong water pressure. There are a fun assortment of videos to watch - including on VHS! And books and games to play, too.
My favorite memory of our time there was walking down to the dock and just sitting there talking after dinner watching the sunset over the lake. Absolutely beautiful and serene.
Very comfortable. Soft towels. Beautiful views from the dock, fun kayaking. Loved it there. Made a reservation to stay again next year.
Excellent!
Great stay

This vacation house was equipped with everything I needed and more. From spices to cook with, boardgames to kayaks and firepit, one can have a great stay with family and friends which is exactly what I did. The house layout was practical with two rooms and a full bath on one side and the master bedroom and bathroom on the opposite end. Though it was raining when I stayed, the back porch overlooking the lake was very relaxing. Tracy (the host) was responsive and polite; I recommend this property for a nice stay.

Traci's house was perfect! It had everything we needed and more. It was perfect for spending time with the family and just enjoying the beautiful lake view. Everything was accessible and close. I would definitely comeand stay here again. Definitely recommend this place!!!

wow what a great spot to Vacation! it's only about 2hrs to 2.5 hrs to any beach. such a nice quiet clean neighborhood .this house is such a perfect place to stay ,clean,quiet,it has the best screen porch and a super nice boat house and dock.its literally home away from home .has a full size BBQ and all the cook ware youll need to be able to cook at home ,or if you feel like going out its just minutes from some great restaurants and a really cool rock shop .I love this House!

Very lovely, well equipped and nicely decorated lake house. Our family loved spending time at the dock, and we appreciate the access to dock supplies. The house had everything we needed and more. Kitchen was well stocked with condiments/spices, towels were luxurious and more than enough for family of 5, and board games and free streaming access were provided. Our family had a very relaxing and enjoyable weekend.
We had a very great stay. We fished the lake relaxed and toured the city.
Beautiful and quiet home, very nice to relax, we had a great time 🙂

Warm and welcoming stay! This host knows how to make your stay enjoyable. No need to worry Traci has everything covered.
With a recent Naval Academy grad on board our family needed a nice getaway….Thank you Traci for accommodating us.

Traci's home has everythingyou absolutely need for a wonderful stay on Lake Sebring. I was so impressed, and the view was gorgeous. I would recommend Traci's house to anyone interested in staying in the Sebring area.

Nice house on a lake. Great private dock to hang out in and fish from. has garage full of things to help enhance your stay like bikes and coolers and even a couple fishing poles. Not great fishing from the dock but you can take the kayaks out to better spots on the lake. But the kayaks are definitely not designed for fishing. Hard to bring tackle and poles with you, But can be done. Only a few minutes from walmart and other stores. very convenient. The house is what you'd expect. Only issue we had was that the air conditioning struggled. The house rules says you aren't allowed to set the air conditioner to below 72 degrees which was too warm for our family. And during our stay the house would heat up during the day to 75 or 76 degrees during the peak heat times. luckily we weren't at the house during those times but a couple days of our week long stay.
Great location, very clean and well appointed. Top notch.
We loved it! It was clean, comfortable, and relaxing, and I could easily have a hook wet within a minute of deciding to go fishing. The area was very quiet and peaceful and we would love to go back.

This place is everything they say and more. We went on a golf weekend with friends and it was so relaxing and beautiful to come back at the end of the day and just sit out on the dock. The kitchen had everything you could possibly need which is great if you are cooking. The house is immaculate.
Manatee Manor is our favorite Airbnb in central Florida! It is clean, beautiful and the host is very helpful.
10/10. Very clean home and has everything you could need!

We had a wonderful time here. The house was exactly as advertised, and even though we were only there two nights we took advantage of the kayak, the pier, and the screened in porch. We will certainly consider staying here again if we are in the area.

This is home away from home for my golf buddies and I. The house is extremely clean and equipped with everything you could possibly need...and then some. The location is excellent and the atmosphere is more than relaxing. Traci is a wonderful host who is very responsive and genuinely cares about the experience had by the guests who book this great home. We are hoping to return soon.

The house was perfect for our visit to Sebring. Lots of thoughtful little things like phone chargers, toiletries if you forgot something. So nice to be able sit outside by the lake. We didn’t kayak this time but they are available. Communication was perfect. We will definitely stay here again when we are in town.
Beautiful home! The family enjoyed the area fishing, the dock and everything inside the home was clean, well appointed and nice. Great hosts and we will be back.

Loved my stay at Traci's place! We were in town for the races at Sebring and this house had everything. Four beds, 3 bedrooms, full kitchen and garage. We have everything we needed to be comfortable during our stay. Traci's place was incredible value as well as most similar stays in the area are much more expensive the week of the IMSA race. We will 1000% be back!
We had our family gather on Lake Sebring for a small event and this stay exceeded our expectations,
A beautiful lake house very tastefully decorated. Very well stocked from everyday needs and extras. Location was very relaxing and close to everything.
Amazing set of amenities come with this place. Awesome hosts as well. Superb sunrises & sunsets also come with this place. Everything about our month-long stay was 5-star.
Clean, cozy home with many amenities.
Super convenient for Sebring raceway, kid friendly and well set up. Will definitely book again!

Manatee Manor is a great house! It is super clean and has everything you could possibly need for a trip away from home. It is right on the lake and has a nice dock to sit and relax. All amenities you could ask for! Traci was super helpful and responsive before and during trip if needed. Definitely recommend! I just wish we had time to enjoy the kayaks and lake on our visit. There is always next time!
Best stay ever! Very clean and great outdoor space to relax and unwind for a quiet weekend. Great location to stay if you’re headed to Legoland, too!
So clean, plenty of room, right on the lake, and all the amenities you could want/need. Will definitely re-book if visiting the Tampa area in the future!

We really enjoyed our time here! The setting was beautiful and peaceful. The home was very clean and very thoughtfully stocked. Our hostess was always available and very friendly. One of my favorite Airbnbs for sure!

The house was perfect for our group of 3 adults and 2 kids. Great safe and quiet road. My favorite part of the house was the dock area where we had coffee each morning and ended the night fishing under the colorful lights! Was a 5 minute drive from Walmart, grocery stores, and restaurants. 45 minutes to Bok Tower Gardens, which we highly recommend if you enjoy beauty and have a few hours to spend there. We will be back!

The house is super comfortable. The kitchen has everything really wonderful , it has a kayak that you can use it, they will really grill it beautifully . It's in a super quiet place, good neighborhood . I recommend Traci's house, he spends expectations, I recommend 100

Immaculate home on a beautiful lake. The house is equipped with any needs and then some. Traci the host was superb and so responsive from start to finish. Sunrises and sunsets from the private dock were fabulous.
Its a must stop if your in this area.
Highly recommend!!!🙌🏻

We are repeat visitors to this wonderful home. It is spotless clean and has everything you could possibly imagine for a relaxing, enjoyable stay. The check-in process always goes perfectly, and the host, Traci, immediately responds to all communication. We have played seven very nice, inexpensive golf courses during our stays. The courses are all within minutes of the home. There are also great restaurants and shopping nearby. We are planning on a longer stay next trip so we can spend more time at the house.

We had such a lovely time at your home, my family was really impressed by how organized everything was, as well as all of the amenities. making big family meals around the big dining tables was a huge hit with Granny!
the dock on the water was so nice to have a happy hour or an early morning coffee on - highly recommend!

Beatiful, clean house and scenic location. Tons of amenities included made our over week long stay a breeze. No hassle check-in and out. "House manual" provided with tons of info including local area suggestions. Will definitely book again if in the area.

Traci place is absolutely perfect, my family and I had an awesome stay at Traci place. Was the best AIRBNB that we've ever stayed with every amenities you could think of. We will definitely stay here again. I will give a 10 STAR 🌟 FOR THIS STAY.
Great place to stay! Traci does an excellent job of providing anything you could possibly need + more! Very clean, organized, and homie. Will stay again if we’re in the area!

Great place to stay at. Everything in the house was amazing they even provided little items just in case you forgot. Great communication and anything we needed they were just a call away . I’ll definitely come back again.

Exceeds expectations. Every comfort has been provided for, from soft towels to twinkle lights at night on the deck. Not huge, but fully decked out kitchen and house. Very sweet and straightforward host.
It is worth it. Beautiful place to enjoy with family and friends.

Great location, with enjoyable amenities for a quick getaway or gathering. The Manatee Manor was cozy, comfortable with nice views of the lake. My family and I had a wonderful weekend there. Highly recommend.
Beautiful place for a family get away everything you need is provided the towels are wonderful. Traci is a wonderful hostess and very helpful. I would recommend her highly
Great communication from the property manager and beautiful views!

We absolutely loved Manatee Manor! The house was beautiful and had lots of useful items. The kayaks and bikes were awesome! The dock provide a great time! Traci was a delight to work with! Very family and kid friendly!

We are return customers. This house was perfect for our guy's golf weekend getaway. It has everything you need and then some. The location is amazing. We played three very nice, inexpensive, courses all within a few minutes of the house. The house would also be perfect for a family wishing to enjoy the area and relax on the lake. It is spotless clean, and Traci makes sure you have everything you need to have a perfect stay. We are hoping to return in a few months.

This is by far the best place we have ever stayed at with Airbnb and VRBO. Traci had everything covered and I do mean everything, down to water sandals for your feet. The place is immaculate and very convenient to everything.
The view was spectacular and the kayaks were a great addition. I actually kayaked around the entire lake! We definitely will be staying here again in the near future. I can’t say enough about this place, it was absolutely gorgeous!
Thank you Traci for sharing your place with us!

Traci went above & beyond and thought of everything! We stayed at her lake home with our family of 5. There was nothing she didn’t think of that wasn't available at our fingertips.
The home itself was cozy, clean, convenient to get around & relaxing. We tried a lot of new things that had been on our to do list. We went to Bok Towers, Spooky Hill, Solomons Castle, Highland Hammocks state park, just to mention a few. Traci’s place was central to everything. Having our children with us, car time was important. Everything was within reasonable distance. And when we were back at the house relaxing, the kids found plenty to do with fishing, going in the lake, kayaking or playing a game of cornhole.
I would recommend this lake home time & time again!
Great place and great host! Had a wonderful time!

Perfect location for a romantic getaway or a relaxing family trip . The house is beautiful , cozy, extremely clean and accurate to the description. Communication with Traci was great and the checkin process very easy. The view of the lake is stunning and perfect to enjoy a glass of wine or a romantic dinner. Also kayaking was very fun!. I most definitely recommend it !.

We had a great stay for our golf weekend at Manatee Manor. The house was spotless, and it had everything imaginable to make our visit perfect. The house is located very close to grocery stores, other shopping, and numerous golf courses. Traci was a wonderful host with great communication. I highly recommend this location for pure relaxation and fun.

Oh my gosh. What a find for a family gathering. There were six of us, there was plenty of room. The house was clean and well stocked, from paper to wood for the fire pit. Bed was just right for me, not to firm, not to soft. We gathered on the dock, in the Florida room, and the living room. The kayaks were in good condition and well used by us. The views and wildlife from the lake was delightful. Traci was available by phone and text, not that the accommodation required any extra attention. Wouldn't hesitate to book with Traci again.
Great! Amazing! Terrific! Not only is the inside of the house so lovely and beachy and open but a BEAUTFIUL yard and dock is attached. Master bedroom is to die for. Very clean. Traci is great

Traci's is a beautiful place, everything clean and working, and fully stocked. We can honestly say that this was one of the best stays that we've booked. The view of the lake from the boathouse is spectacular and the area including Sebring is calm and peaceful with great restaurants and activities. We're looking forward to booking Traci's again.

A must stay! The location is priceless. The home is cozy with everything you could want on vacation at the lake. Waking up to the lake view is amazing! Traci is an amazing host! The neighbors are friendly. We will definitely keep this location in our favorites to visit again!
We loved this place! The lake views were gorgeous! We enjoyed kayaking and eating at the porch and dock! This is the best Airbnb we have ever stayed at! Would stay again!

You will find Traci's place exactly as described and even more. The setting is a bonus and having the lake access with the pier and dock available will make your mornings and evenings really a pleasure. Her communication was brisk and we never had any questions left unanswered. If you are looking for a great place to relax when in the area you need look no further. We will be back for sure.

My family and I stayed her for a few days to unwind and spend some time together. The place was perfect for what we needed. Traci was easy to get in touch with for any questions that we had. Highly recommended.

This home is a hidden gem. Traci is one of the most responsive and thoughtful hosts I have ever encountered. The process was seamless - from reservation to check-out. The home was spotless and incredibly well appointed. Traci has thought of everything! Magnificent to just sit on the dock or the screened patio enjoying a drink or a candlelit dinner, or watch the sunrise/set while reading a book. So calm and relaxing. Location is perfect to enjoy everything Sebring has to offer (which may be more than you think!) Cannot wait to return and use the provided kayaks to explore the lake!

I have to say this is a beautiful home. The location is great. Stores and restaurants are all a short drive away. The view of the lake is beautiful. Traci is a wonderful host and has an immaculately clean house. The kitchen is set up with every type of utensil that you could possibly want. She even included multiple spices for your cooking. Traci has gone above and beyond what you would find with most airbnb homes. I greatly appreciated everything that she did and would highly recommend this home.

If you are lucky enough to be able to book a reservation at this house, with this host, you will have the best experience ever. This place is so clean and well equipped. The location is center to Lake Placid, and Gulf and ocean, golf courses galore, a fabulous state park with great trails, orange groves all around, tons of lakes for fishing and the best time ever was an air boat ride with Air boat Wildlife Adventures. Breathtaking. Traci was a great host and the lake is beautiful. We loved kayaking on the lake.

This place feels like home :-) Everything was very clean and very comfy. If you're looking for a well stocked kitchen, you won't be disappointed. Don't miss the beautiful sunrises and sunsets from the screened in patio.
Lovely, clean, comfortable home on a lake with gorgeous sunrise and sunset views. The house had everything one could need!

Great place to stay. Good communication with fast responses, they even let us check in earlier. Clean house, comfortable, with all we needed. Beautiful view of lake and quiet neighborhood. I would definitely recommend!

Beautiful location right on Lake Seabring. The home had a great vibe. A lot of attention to detail. They had everything you could need, even a little "emergency lady kit" with earring backings and such! Very thoughtful in there choices made to make it comfortable & convenient when you are away from home. Aaron was super fast to communicate when needed as well. Overall, a great experience!
The cutest little cottage in Sebring. Amazing lake view and very close to stores and restaurants.
I’ve stayed in many AirB&B’s over the last 15 years and Aarons was a 10out of 10!
Lovely little home with everything you need for a great stay on a Sebring lake.

We loved staying at the Sunrise Cottage!! It is a beautiful location right by Lake Sebring. It was very peaceful & quiet. Sitting on the deck was such a treat!!
Aaron & Kimberly have done a great job with tasteful & comfortable furnishings in the cottage !! You feel right at home. They clearly considered what travelers might need & made it all available.
The recommendations that
our hosts provided were invaluable! We were able to enjoy a lot of local restaurants & other amenities that we would not of known about. Sunrise cottage is a special place !! We really enjoyed our stay there. If our travels bring us back to Sebring we would love to stay there again!
Beautiful and cozy place with comfy beds. Host left wine and snacks for our arrival. Nice backyard and view of the lake. Would definitely stay again.

It was a well maintained house, very comfortable to stay with a beautiful view of the lake, easy parking and many amenities in the house to make you feel right at home. I would absolutely recommend staying there and i look forward to making another trip.
Fantastic location and communication. Aaron had such care and consideration for his guests with small amenities like a bottle of wine on arrival. Would absolutely stay again!
Second time here and loved 🥰. I will be a regular visitor. Thanks Aaron for everything and loved the chilled bottle of wine and goodies! Just wonderful!!!
Such a lovely space. We will definitely be back
Great
This was our second time staying here and it was perfect. Minutes away from everything we needed and very comfortable. Thank you for the additional touches that made us feel welcome!
This is a great house! Would definitely recommend!

Aaron's home is amazing! What a beautiful location!!! Plenty of room for my entire group with a lot of things to do or not do while you were sitting on the back porch looking at the water. Spacious and clean; we had everything we needed and more. We even booked for an additional night. Would definitely recommend! We will be back!
One of the most relaxing and perfect place we have stayed at! The most beautiful view. Everything was extremely clean and ready for us. We loved our stay and will definitely be back!
The house was beautiful, and the lake was peaceful! The house had everything we needed to enjoy our stay!

Aaron's place was great. They left snacks for us and it was nicer than it appears in the photos. It has a beautiful view of the lake and nice outdoor areas. it is located very close to restaurants, grocery stores, etc. Overall an exceptional place
Beautiful home in perfect location to Sun n Lake golf course!

The Lake house was charming and quaint. When we walked thru the door there was a gift basket with wine, snacks and this amazing homemade soap. The view of the lake was beautiful!!! We loved sitting on the deck and having a glass of wine in the evening and coffee in the morning. I can't wait to revisit and Aaron was an awesome host. Thank you for sharing your little gem on the lake with us!!!

5 star stay!! Wonderfully located on a beautiful lake and squeeky clean home! If anyone is reading reviews in search of a rental, stop scrolling and book Sunrise Cottage! Aaron was very responsive and helpful. The neighbors on each side were very pleasant and kind. The home is equipped with everything needed. Bring your fishing poles and swimsuits! Will be visiting again!
The best ever! Loved everything about it!

Host was outstanding. Home was wonderful decorated, charming, and super clean 🧽!
The beds were so comfortable and the host even left goodies and a bottle of wine 🍷.
I would definitely recommend this place for sure. I have already made reservations for next month.
Aaron you were a great host and thank you so much for everything! Wonderful cottage.

This was one of the best airbnb's I've ever stayed at. It was perfectly clean, laid out, decorated, organized, and was fully stocked with anything we may need. Also, complimentary wine, food, snacks, water, etc was a surprise that was really nice and made us feel welcomed. Could not recommend more, and out of the hundreds of stays at all kinds of airbnb's in the world this was one of my favorites.
Very nice accomodations and very clean. The house has a nice view of the lake and has a dock. The location was conveniently located, close to shopping and other attractions.

5+ Stars-- would definitely rent again! The host was very responsive, and the property was perfect! We had everything we needed, and so much more! Our only regret is not spending more time there. If you are thinking about booking, DO IT! You won't regret your decision to stay in this adorable cottage!
The whole experience was awesome! We were especially impressed by the extra welcoming touches that Aaron and Kimberly provided. First class all the way!
Absolutely breath taking. Thanks for allowing us to share your space. Would highly recommended!!!
The rental was perfect for my crew coming into town. Aaron made it easy to get them checked in and was super accommodating.

It’s in walking distance to restaurants, but there are no sidewalks: That is not and reflection on the host obviously. The neighbors were great and friendly. My adult kids loved fishing off the dock. I live in upstate, New York and I think I saw more wildlife there than I do at home. ￼
Great property with amazing views and a peaceful backyard water front setting. The property was great with great accommodations.
This was the second time we stayed at this place. Very peaceful and beautiful surrounding. Perfect for a weekend getaway.
As usual, everything was great, the view, proximity to the track and eateries. Thanks again for having us.
Very nice, quiet and large house. Great views of sunset. Would stay again.

"Exceptional experience with Airbnb! From booking to check-out, everything was seamless. The accommodation exceeded expectations, immaculately clean with thoughtful amenities. Host communication was prompt and helpful. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a top-notch stay!"

Beautiful property with even more beautiful views of the lake.
My 3 friends and I spent a relaxing weekend with our kids there. The house was very nice and clean. It is actually larger and nicer than it appeared on the photos. Our kids had so much fun playing on the sand beach, fishing, kayaking and paddle boarding. They didn't want to leave. Large grass area was great for playing as well.
Nicole was very nice and responsive.
Great place! We will be back soon!
Amazing location sunsets were awesome. I would highly recommend this home. Will defiantly be returning.

Nicole's house is very roomy and comfortable. Exceptionally clean and well supplied, the best part was enjoying the sun setting over the lake while sitting in the screened porch. Even though the house is very quiet and secluded, it's only about 5 minutes to Publix. Exactly as described, I give it 5 stars.
Such a peaceful spot in Sebring! Nicole always responded quickly to my questions and allowed us to check in early. The house was pristine and well appointed. We hope to stay here again!

We really enjoyed staying here. It had tons of space and a very beautiful setting. The only thing that surprised us was that there was someone living on the property that we were unaware of. Their space was separate, it just would’ve been nice to know. We were startled when we came home one evening and the garage was open. But overall we would stay here again. The lake was beautiful to look at!

Bed was very comfortable and the shower was awesome!! My favorite part however was sitting on the swing overlooking the water. It is so incredibly peaceful there. Close to the track and any amenities you needed.
A lovely stay! Very spacious and met all of our needs

Beautiful home. Breathe taking sunsets. Roomy, quiet, clean home. Home has all necessities needed for a comfortable, family stay. Nicole was helpful and quick to respond. Hope to return to this beautiful home to make more memories.
This place was amazing. Extremely peaceful and private. Great place to just get away for a while. Host was wonderful and extremely helpful/responsive.
Great place with amazing lake view.
Great stay

We selected Nicole’s house based on pictures and description, but still didn’t measured to how beautiful and peaceful the home really is. The House is everything we could have hoped for and more. The sunset view didn’t disappoint. I definitely recommend Nicole’s place and look forward to rent it again.
Beautiful home on a lakefrontsetting. Beautiful sunsets.
